title: $2100-2/2 North Miami/Ives Dairy Villa-Fenced Patio-Pool-W/D in Unit
neighborhood: North Miami-Ives Dairy Rd-Just West of I95
posting_body: ['2 BEDROOM 2 BATH.', 'GUARD GATED UPDATED VILLA IN SIERRA RIDGE WITH WOOD LAMINATED FLOOR IN THE BEDROOMS.', 'OPEN KITCHEN, STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES, NEW WASHER & DRYER INSIDE THE UNIT, LARGE FENCED PATIO.', 'CLUBHOUSE WITH COMMUNITY POOL & PLAYGROUND FOR KIDS.', 'FEW MINUTES TO AVENTURA MALL.NEAR', 'SHOPS, RESTAURANTS, HIGHWAYS AND GOLF COURSES.', 'PERFECT PLACE TO LIVE.', 'ASSOCIATION TAKES 2-4 WEEKS FOR APPROVAL AND IS MANDATORY.', 'THIS IS A YEARLY LEASE – NOT SHORT TERM.', 'Landlord requires First Month, Last Month and Security Deposit to move in (3 month’s rent).', ' Acceptable credit score/report for all persons on the lease (690+), background check and PROOF of income showing sustained combined incomes at least 3 times the amount of the monthly rent.', 'Must have no judgments or money owed to previous landlords.', 'Dianne Warren,', 'show contact info', ', Beachfront Realty.', ' Map view is approximate, not exact, for security reasons.', 'Please CALL to view this property.', ' No texts or emails for first contact.', ' Private owner property.']
